document_data.name: ''Heartwood Spear''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Heartwood spears''''' were [[enchanted]] [[elf|elven]] [[polearm]]s rumored to originate from the isle of [[Evereska]].
document_data.Powers: These [[spear]]s were given a powerful ''+4'' enchantment, and it burned its targets with magical [[acid]] upon a successful strike. Additionally, ''heartwood spears'' had a solid chance of leaving their targets dazed.
document_data.History:
The first ''Heartwood spear'' was a gift from the elves of Evereska to the [[human]] nation of [[Aglarond]] in the [[Unapproachable East]]. The gift was presented following the declaration of peace between them in the {{YearlinkName|1056}}. Since then, ''Heartwood spears'' were created by hand by master weaponsmiths. Some claimed that these weapon smiths were still working on the isle of Evereska as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

By the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, ''Heartwood spears'' could be found in the hands of prominent individuals and master merchants of [[Neverwinter]] on the [[Sword Coast]] and [[Elventree]] on the [[Moonsea]], among other places.
